home.hero_subtitle_template: The next DI.DAY will take place on {date}
home.featured_desc: On the first Sunday of every month, we encourage you to take a step toward digital independence. Discover our switch recipes and tips.
home.why_p1: Big tech corporations collect massive amounts of data, influence our perception through algorithms, and have an enormous impact on our lives.
home.why_p2: There are privacy-friendly and ethical alternatives for almost every service. Switching is often easier than expected!
home.contribute_desc: Every small step counts. Share your experiences and help others switch.
home.events_desc: Check out Digital Independence Day events near you and join in!
